translations: 过多；过剩；[医] 多血症

sentences.sentence: A plethora of new operators will be allowed to enter the market.
sentences.translation: 过多的新经营者将获准进入市场。

sentences.sentence: Both it and its companions would then decay almost instantly into a plethora of less fleeting bits, some of which could be detected.
sentences.translation: 然后，它与它的伙伴们将会几乎在瞬间衰变为大批寿命更短的微粒子，其中有一些能被检测出来。

sentences.sentence: He has a plethora of styles in his designs.
sentences.translation: 他的设计拥有很多风格。
